content.query:
TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.Athletes

COPY INTO dbo.Athletes
    (Country, Discipline, FirstName, LastName )
FROM 'https://tokyoolympicsraul.dfs.core.windows.net/tokyo-olympics-container/transformed-data/Athletes_transformed/**.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    MAXERRORS = 0,
    IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
);

TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.Coaches

COPY INTO dbo.Coaches
    (Name, Country, Discipline, Event)
FROM 'https://tokyoolympicsraul.dfs.core.windows.net/tokyo-olympics-container/transformed-data/Coaches/**.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    MAXERRORS = 0,
    IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
);

TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.Teams

COPY INTO dbo.Teams
    (TeamName, Discipline, Country, Event)
FROM 'https://tokyoolympicsraul.dfs.core.windows.net/tokyo-olympics-container/transformed-data/Teams/**.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    MAXERRORS = 0,
    IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
);

TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.EntriesGender

COPY INTO dbo.EntriesGender
    (Discipline, Female, Male, Total)
FROM 'https://tokyoolympicsraul.dfs.core.windows.net/tokyo-olympics-container/transformed-data/Teams/**.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    MAXERRORS = 0,
    IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
);

TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.Medals

COPY INTO dbo.Medals
    (Rank, TeamCountry, Gold, Silver, Bronze, Total, RankBytotal)
FROM 'https://tokyoolympicsraul.dfs.core.windows.net/tokyo-olympics-container/transformed-data/Teams/**.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    MAXERRORS = 0,
    IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
);
